short_id: Sistem Anti-Tailgating Berbasis Video dirancang khusus untuk e-gate imigrasi, memungkinkan pemantauan waktu nyata (real-time) terhadap lalu lintas tanpa izin melalui analitik video canggih pada perangkat
desc_en:
The Video-based Anti-Tailgating System is purpose-built for immigration e-gate, enabling real-time monitoring of unauthorized passage through advanced on-device video analytics. Using embedded Al, behavior recognition, and machine vision, the system identifies security risks such as tailgating, evasive movement, and abnormal entries-without relying on backend servers.
Mounted above the inspection e-gate, it works autonomously and integrates seamlessly with e-gates, biometric verification stations, and security checking systems. The system delivers instant alerts, video capture, and event logging, helping border control agencies reduce manual oversight while significantly enhancing port security and throughput efficiency.
